name: Taxi Driver (Jonathan's Games)
description:
Totally not a ripoff of the classic 1996 game by SEGA : Crazy Taxi

The Game

The main objective of the game is to pick up customers and take them to their chosen destination as quickly as possible while dodging obstacles (I guess you can also have fun ramming into innocents pedestrians you psycho).

System Requirements

Just have a PC that is good enough (if the game lags, your PC is just bad, cope).


Is it a reference to  the 1976 American film directed by Martin Scorsese, Taxi Driver?

Perhaps...
